name: Crime World: The Dark Woods
description:
A Visual Novel from "Crime World: series by OnlyWax RW and Y. Huang.

The two sisters, Fei and Sina, found themselves in the dark woods where they had survived from the bus accident. How the sisters have to survive in the dark woods?

Choose Fei or Sina. They have their own point of view.

Type: Visual Novel

Genre: Mystery, Action, Fantasy, Crime Fiction, Thriller

Language: English

Engine: Ren'py

Duration: Average to long Age: 16+ (18+)

Platforms: Windows, Mac, Linux

Enjoy!

Previous Story: Crime World: The Story of Noil Chen

https://onlywax-rw.itch.io/crime-world-the-story-of-noil-chen-visual-novel

Previous Story: Anger and Lost - A Kinetic Short Story

https://onlywax-rw.itch.io/anger-and-lost-a-kinetic-short-story

"This story contains disturbing scenes, viewer discretion is advised."
